issues: Some text boxes are not right-aligned.
Icons are not placed on the right side of the text.
Some elements appear close together, causing potential overlap.

slides.summary: The slide is mostly well-designed but needs adjustments for RTL alignment and icon positioning.
recommendations: Ensure all text boxes are right-aligned to adhere to RTL conventions.
Move icons to the right side of their corresponding text for better alignment.
Increase spacing between closely positioned elements to enhance clarity.
